task.title: Watering Planted Crops
task.shortdesc: In order for your crops to grow, they must be watered on a daily basis until they are ready to harvest. If you miss a day of watering, your crops will not die, but they also will not progress to the next stage of growth.

taskbody.prereq: You will need a watering can, which was provided at the start of the game, to water your crops.

context.note: You do not need to water your crops on days where it is raining.
context.p: By crafting and using sprinklers your plants will be water automatically each day.

step.cmd: Equip the watering can by moving it to the top bar of your inventory and using the corresponding number key to select it.
Left click to fill the can with water.
step.tutorialinfo: You do not need to hold down to fill the can. One click should fill it all the way.
step.stepresult: The fill bar on the watering can icon in your inventory should return to the top, and a slurping sound effect will play.

step.cmd: Approach the crop you want to water and right click.
step.stepresult: The ground underneath the crop you chose to water should darken and you will hear a sound effect of pouring water.
